item.title: 2016.10.27 patch notes (v52.01) | TERA KR
item.description: Update 1. Skill Warrior Revised Edge system Edge will stack on the player instead of the monster - Stack UI will be display beneath the HP/MP bar - Choosing the option shown above will display stack under the HP bar - Scythe - Changed Glyph of Carving from increase crit chance by 2 times to 3 times against monsters - Increased PvE damage by 10% - Smoke Aggressor - Changed to instantiate instantly - While Shadow is summoned, it will take 50% (PvP 20%) of the damage - Traverse Cut - Removed endurance debuff - Added 0.
